title: Account Warning for being Anti-Bullying
body:
I made a response to a post yesterday where the original post was someone getting a kick out of bullying another player. The trolls united and downvoted my anti-bullying post- but then LoL sent my account a warning for posting such things on the forums.

So Riot openly endorses bullying. Thanks for letting us know.

The LoL community and Riot's lack of control over it makes so much sense now: Riot WANTS bullies and trolls!

replies.body:
I'll just say the same thing I said on your post that was deleted;

Were you a jerk in your reply to them? Because that is against forum policy, without exception.
No, as I said, it was a post against bullying.
With replies like you gave before, I seriously doubt you.
I don't care what you think. You're obviously a bully too.
I don't think you know what a bully is.

**bully** [b_oo_ l-ee]

noun, plural **bullies**

1. an individual who disagrees with SlytherMinn

_see also: Valkyrie Witch, Strawberrycocoa, Xavaresxutris_ ~~[citation needed]~~[1]

_[1] see reply_
Approved by the National Dictionary Association of America.

Yup, add you to the list.

This is your LoL community at work, Riot.

Full of bullies, trolls, and your coworkers.
Valkyrie Witch has been commenting on every post I've made today, so yes he/she is. Why do so many people support bullies?
Why do you think a comment like "How do you like the taste of Riot in your mouth?" is appropriate?

Because you do too.

You're a bully, like Valkyrie and apparently Riot.
No, I just think you're wrong. Bullying is not "disagreeing with you".
I think he has devolved to just being a troll now -_-
No, you're just a bully and getting called out on it.
Um, you made 1 post twice and the first was deleted lol. Am I not allowed to retain the same opinion for the same post? Silly goose.
It was not deleted, it was moved to another topic. Get your facts straight.

If you said "Do you enjoy the taste of Riot in your mouth?" in response to "Were you a jerk in your reply to them? Because that is against forum policy, without exception," then are you are obviously a bully.

-_-

Shame on you.

It puts the assumption that I did something wrong as the basis of the conversation in defense of the almighty Riot.

Shame on Riot is the point.
No, it's just saying "this is what usually happens, is that the case there too?" and your behaviour just proved it.

> [{quoted}](name=Valkyrie Witch,realm=NA,application-id=bzRrPGQO,discussion-id=6UTbPKuF,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-05-11T03:09:32.963+0000)
>
> With replies like you gave before, I seriously doubt you.
> 
> http://snag.gy/6KNQ9.jpg

We didnt' even need Lyte, this guy is smiting himself.

Ima go ahead and say that bullying irl is much different than bullying on league. If someone is rude, toxic etc, report, mute them and move on. Don't get mad and frustrated over what some person online  "bullies" you over for, they don't know you.

 Their will always be people who are just horrible to other people online. Set an example instead of feeding the trolls. Like a wise man once said "Time flies like an arrow, fruit flies like banana."

Well we can't really tell if we don't know what you said and what they said.

For all I know, you could have been equally or more toxic in response, garnering downvotes.

>The LoL community and Riot's lack of control over it makes so much sense now: Riot WANTS bullies and trolls!

That is such a huge leap and illogical conclusion I can't help but find your entire OP to be flawed.
If you read Riot's response to what I wrote, it is the only logical conclusion.

But I can't, because you haven't posted it.

If you want us to side with us, show us what happened because without objective proof it's just an accusation.
I don't care if you do. I just want Riot to see what they have become.

They're probably not going to care, just like anyone else when someone can't provide proof.

With the number of people who whine about restrictions after clearly showing they're toxic (one dude even tried to say it's okay to flame people who are just bad at the game!), situations like this don't really surprise me anymore. I want to feel apathy so I can just move on, but honestly I still feel pity for you and those who never understand consequences.

They have the proof. They sent the response.

Do you even comprehend the sequence of events here?

Let me spell it out for you:

1) Someone posted about being a bully
2) I responded how bullying aint cool bro
3) Trolls and bullies downvoted my post
4) Riot warned my account for that post
5) I made this post

Do you understand now?

Here, allow me to spell it out for you why we can't just side with you immediately.

1) Show us the post 
2) Show us the response
3) This one depends on the previous two, so we can determine if it was trolls and bullies downvoting an innocent person or innocent people downvoting a troll and bully
4) Yes, they do that when people break rules. If you can't provide 1-2 and help us with 3, then we have to assume you broke the rules and got punished fairly.
5) Yes, yes you did.

Do you understand now?
This attitude is why Hitler rose to power.
That's an insult to anyone who actually knows their history.
You would have made a great NAZI.

Ah, the classic part where after I unravel your entire charade, you devolve into non-sequiturs and ramblings in a meek and pitiful attempt to insult me. 

And honestly, you're doing exactly what you were complaining about earlier. Bullying the guy who isn't putting up with your shit. He who fights monsters, indeed.

Now seriously, knock it off. You got a level 30 account, so you've obviously been playing for awhile, so don't throw it away by being stupid and getting banned. Either delete this thread before enough people report it for Riot to examine it before zapping it (yes, they look at the threads. I've had one removed on a technicality before, and even got a warning once), or come clean and just be honest without "bullying" others who use their critical thought to realize you're pulling their legs.

Yes, I'm giving you a chance to save yourself instead of just going "stfu troll." Blame it on the Doctor Who episodes I've been watching, but at least think about it. Edit your thread, delete it, come clean, or do something. Not everyone gets a second chance.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Godwin%27s_law
They warned your account because your comment got downvoted so many times, not because they support bullying. Stop being so thick-skulled.
i am disappointed with myself for looking at this title and taking it serious for a second and clicking on it.

Bullying is harassing someone in an effort to physically, emotionally, or spiritually harm them.

Making an observation of someone playing a frustrated blame game is not bullying. 

I'm not saying that you weren't bullied and neither is Valkyrie Witch. We just have our doubts as to who started/said what because of the way you act.
Prepare for deletion.

I have the screencap and if deleted, it's going straight to my highly popular Reddit.

Your move, Riot.

> [{quoted}](name=SlytherMinn,realm=NA,application-id=bzRrPGQO,discussion-id=6UTbPKuF,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-11T02:56:17.316+0000)
>
> I have the screencap and if deleted, it's going straight to my highly popular Reddit.
> 
> Your move, Riot.

could you show the screencap, were only seeing one side of the argument with nothing to go on, which is making things worse for you
Either you're for or against bullying. It's not a hard choice.
Getting a bit Republican in here.
Reported comment. No need for baseless mud-slinging politics in this discussion. That is another form of bullying.
So is oversimplifying an issue and avoiding the actual topic by being contentious.
Or the LoL community is too big for Riot to be babysitting every little interaction.
What about Riot responded to it by warning my account do you not comprehend?
What about remaking a thread that got you a warning do you think is a good idea?
So you also support bullies. Good to know.

If that's "bullying" (I prefer cyber-bullying, they're distinct), you're a cyber-bully. But it isn't, because you can't just counter-troll, dude, that's still trolling, even if you're trolling back. So Imma downvote your rage-post, too.

Your concept of "bullying" is incorrect. Its heart is way in the wrong place. And you're on the fast track to getting slammed again, dude, because you're trolling in response to being called out for trolling. That's not a good pattern to fall into.

That's not arguable. Don't be a prick, even if someone else is being a prick. Best way to deal with them is to not respond to them, ever. It works on the Internet beautifully, less so in real life.
You probably deserve it.
